[Evolution Host](https://evolution-host.com/vps-hosting.php) are offering a premium VPS free of charge to users with a popular website in exchange for small text-based backlinks. There is no hard stock limit for this offer. The requirements will be listed at the bottom of the post.

**VPS Specifications**  
• 4 vCPU Cores  
• 4GB RAM  
• 60GB SSD Storage or 200GB HDD Storage  
• Advanced DDoS Protection  
• KVM Virtualization  
• Dedicated IPv4 Address  
• All ports open  
• France, Canada or USA locations  
• Multiple Linux OS    

These specifications can be improved for websites which would require more resources.

**Offer Requirements/Details**  
• A relatively popular website.  
• A link to the Evolution Host website on a page we both agree on.  
• Linux OS. Windows not included.  

**How to apply**  
E-mail marketing@evolution-host.com with a link to your website. Proof of ownership will be required if your application is accepted.

_Not all applications will be accepted, only ones which meet the criteria we are looking for._
